title: Snacktime: A Fairy Tale Proposal
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In honor of Valentine's Day, Amory tells Ben a snack-size story about a feast-size grand gesture that has left millions of people all over the world wishing they could re-do their marriage proposals.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Snacktime: A Fairy Tale Proposal
itunes:summary: In honor of Valentine's Day, Amory tells Ben a snack-size story about a feast-size grand gesture that has left millions of people all over the world wishing they could re-do their marriage proposals.

media:content.media:description: Left: An animated version of Sthuthi David and Lee Loechler, drawn by Kayla Coombs. Right: The actual Sthuthi David and Lee Loechler, just after getting engaged at the Coolidge Corner Theatre in Brookline, Mass. on December 30, 2019. (Courtesy Kayla Coombs and Jaclyn and Andrew Taylor)

content:encoded: In honor of Valentine's Day, Amory tells Ben a snack-size story about a feast-size grand gesture that has left millions of people all over the world wishing they could re-do their marriage proposals.
